key_risks: Declining ridership due to aging population and remote work trends
Vulnerability to natural disasters such as earthquakes and typhoons
Labor shortages impacting service quality and operational efficiency
Significant debt maturities (JPY 300-400 billion annually until 2028)
controversies: Public criticism over fare increases and service disruptions
Regulatory scrutiny on safety and environmental compliance
environmental_issues: Susceptibility to natural disasters disrupting operations
Need for energy-efficient trains and renewable energy adoption
social_issues: Labor shortages in a competitive job market
Public backlash over fare hikes and service quality
governance_issues: Navigating stringent regulatory and public scrutiny
